examples.example: 上次去敬老院献爱心，给老人们带去了很多欢乐。

translate.english: Last time I went to the nursing home to offer love and brought a lot of joy to the elderly.

examples.example: 上次在旅行中，我结识了很多有趣的新朋友。

translate.english: Last time during the trip, I met a lot of interesting new friends.

examples.example: 上次参加志愿者活动，让我收获了满满的成就感和快乐。

translate.english: Last time participating in the volunteer activity, it let me gain a full sense of accomplishment and happiness.
